title: Breville -- Tips and Tricks: The White Series
description:
Breville's Adèle Schober demonstrates the features and functionality of the Breville White Series: the Soft Top Kettle BKE620XL, the Control Grip BSB400XL, and the Lift and Look Touch BTA630XL

Breville White Lift And Look Touch 4-Slice Toaster - BTA630XL

4 slice motorized long slot toaster with ‘Lift & Look’™ and ‘A Bit More’™ for any shape bread at the touch of a button.

Features:

Motorized carriage with push button controls
One touch ‘A Bit More’™
One touch Motorized ‘Lift & Look’™
Adjustable browning control
LED toasting progress indicator
Easy clean, slide out crumb tray
Extra long toasting slots
Extra wide, self-centering slots
Cool-Touch exterior
Toast ready sound alert
Compact cord storage
Bagel setting
Defrost setting
4 slice long slot configuration
